name: Working Adult (DEMO)
description:
Ralph's job at BONANET, INC. consists of remotely "cleaning up" his co-workers' computers. That basically means erasing a lot of personal files, including memes, family pictures, and even embarrassing poetry! Your personal desktop buddy, Tangerine, helps you out in the process.

Every night before going to bed, Ralph plays a chapter of his favorite game, JOHNNY MARTINI'S QUEST, a live-action noir visual novel about the titular wannabe detective and his wild escapades. Your choices will impact the game witin a game's mysterious narrative...

You'll follow Ralph in a tour of his life, basking in the humor and absurdity of it all until it starts crashing down in strange ways...
